mapper.insert: INSERT INTO item (ino, iimg1, iimg2, iimg3, iprice, iname, icompany, icount, itype, icate, iregdate, idetail) VALUES (#{ino}, #{iimg1}, #{iimg2}, #{iimg3}, #{iprice}, #{iname}, #{icompany}, #{icount}, #{itype}, #{icate}, NOW(), #{idetail})
